column4: hi all! I have i question, i think its simple but here it goes: i have my ubuntu 10.4 intalled but i want to install the new version, whats the best way?  can i just update it? or i have  to install the new one....
The best way is to download an Ubuntu 12.04 .iso image, stick on a CD or USB drive, and boot from it.
During the install process, you will get an option to upgrade the current system to 12.04
You will not lose any files that way.
